description: Take dumplings to the next level with this pork potstickers recipe. The crispy skirt adds a delicious crunch to this feast of homemade dumplings.
name: Pork Potstickers With Crispy Skirt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together 2/3 cup water with flour. Add one-third of the mixture to pan with dumplings, cover with lid and steam for 5 minutes. Remove lid and cook for 1 minute or until excess water has evaporated and skirt is crisp and golden. Cover pan witha plate or tray, then flip pan onto plate so the skirt is facing up. Repeat with remaining oil, dumplings and skirt mixture. Scatter extra onion over dumplings and skirts, then serve with extra soy sauce.
